headline: Apollo Names Diego De Giorgi as Incoming Head of EMEA
summary: LONDON and NEW YORK, Feb. 10, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo (NYSE: APO) today announced that industry veteran Diego De Giorgi will join the firm as a Partner and Head of EMEA. De Giorgi will succeed longtime Apollo Partner Rob Seminara in the role, who will remain in the region to support a successful transition before assuming new, global responsibilities for Apollo later this year. De Giorgi has spent more than 30 years in London serving in key leadership positions for large global banks. As
